mapper.insert: INSERT INTO release (releaseNo, placingOrderNo, releaseStatus, releaseDate) SELECT release_seq.nextval, #{placingOrderNo}, #{releaseStatus}, #{releaseDate} FROM DUAL A WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 0 FROM release WHERE placingOrderNo=#{placingOrderNo})

INSERT INTO releaseProduct (releaseProductNo, releaseNo, releaseProductName, productCnt, productStatus) VALUES (releaseProduct_seq.nextval, #{releaseNo}, #{releaseProductName}, #{productCnt}, #{productStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT releaseNo FROM release WHERE placingOrderNo=#{placingOrderNo}
